value.title: Display selected value from slicer to Power BI Report
value.excerpt: Sometimes, there is a situation where we need to display the selected slicer value in the title of our Power BI visualization. Meaning, we need to set the Dynamic value for our Title column based on the slicer selection. How can we achieve this? How can we set dynamic title value for our Power BI visualization?

value.title: Draw Average Line in Power BI #Shorts
value.excerpt: Welcome to one more Power BI Trick and Tip. During this #Shorts we will learn how we can add an Average Line to our Power BI Graph. We can draw the Average Line for Power BI Cluster Column Chart, Cluster Bar Chart, Area Chart, and Line Chart. To add the Average Line the Procedure is very simple and easy.

value.title: Exclude Blank Records from Distinct Count in Power BI
value.excerpt: Welcome to Wed with the DAX series. Today I’m going to explain one DAX function in Power BI which is – DISTINCTCOUNTNOBLANK()   When we use the DISTICTCOUNT() function in Power BI this will calculate distinct count for the column. This will also include Blank as a distinct record. As a result due to

value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together

value.excerpt: The Power BI PowerShell and the Admin API allow you to quickly inventory your organization and manage workspaces and access. value.title: Power BI URL Filter Updates (August 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the recent updates to using the Power BI URL Filter. The update to using URL Filter parameters in Power BI include updates to operators along with the ability to use more than strings and spaces in table names!   Blog: https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/power-bi-report-url-filter-improvements/
